columns.text: The goal of this task is to determine the minimum annual synergy that the company will gain from the acquisition.

Now, from the exercise, we know the following information:
|Concept|Amount| |:--:|:--:| |Offer Value | $\$16,500,000$| |Market Value| $\$13,400,000$|
Table 1: Information about Two Guys Fries, Corp.

Now, the **Incremental Net Gain from the acquisition** for Three Guys Burgers, Inc. can be calculated by manipulating equation $(1)$ and solving: $$ \begin{align*} V_{B}^{*}&=\Delta V+V_{B}\\[10pt] \Delta V&=V_{B}^{*}-V_{B}\\[10pt] &=\$16,500,000-\$13,400,000\\[10pt] &=\$3,100,000 \end{align*} $$

So, ***the minimum annual synergy that Three Guys, Inc. must gain from
by the acquisition of Two Guys Fries, Corp. is $\bold{\$279,000}$***.
